main: ^Puto is simply made of long grain rice soaked in water, ground and fermented for three days or more, added with just enough sugar to taste and steamed.

c-0: ^It also can be topped with cheese or drizzle it with choclate syrup. It is also perfect to be paired with dinuguan.
^In Calasiao, Pangasinan, they celebrated the Puto Festival on December 26 to 28.
